DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : JAPAN
DOC.TEXT: More Foreign Cars Sold : Sales of_imported cars , trucks and buses in April rose 45 % from a year earlier to 24 # 254 , the sixth consecutive monthly gain , according to the Japan Automobile Dealers Assn.Imported cars have reached a record 8.4 % of the Japanese market , the Japan Automobile Importers Assn . said . Sales of domestic autos have posted year-on-year declines since April , 1993 , the data shows . Import sales were boosted by demand for Honda ' s U.S.-made Accord and other new models , such_as the German Mercedes-Benz C Class and the Swedish Volvo 850 station_wagon , and by lowered prices on Range Rovers , Chryslers and other foreign-made vehicles .
